text: ` ` They should have never given us uniforms if they didn't want us to be an army.'' Offred offers these prophetic words in ` ` Night,'' the tenth and final episode of The Handmaid's Tale's first season. At least, one hopes they are prophetic, given the state of the world in which the show takes place : Gilead, a grotesque reimagining of America in which religious extremists have seized control and repainted the nation in sickening shades of misogyny, fanaticism and fascism.
